short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Upload entire albums to your stem player automatically

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhancement to stemplayer.com that allows the user to upload multiple songs with either a link or file folder. 
Note: You need to have purchased physical stem player to use this extension as well as the main website.
